author: Jordan Hayne
title: Going grocery shopping? Here's how to minimise your coronavirus risk
description: Going to the supermarket to buy essentials is one of the few things we're still encouraged to leave the house to do — and a trip out into the world to buy food is, for most people, unavoidable. Here's how to minimise your risk.
content:
Updated 
March 31, 2020 08:11:49
Going out into the world to buy essentials is one of the few things we're still encouraged to leave the house to do and a trip to a supermarket to buy food is, for most people, unavoidable.
